messages.zh: W，我们遇到了点麻烦。
messages.en: W, we have a problem.

messages.zh: 嚯......值得你们用这个频道联系我，怎么？发现了什么有趣的事情？
messages.en: Ho... For you to contact me on this channel. Why? What did you found that was interesting?

messages.zh: 不太有趣，W，在你重整那些萨卡兹雇佣兵的时候，有一支队伍叛逃了。
messages.en: Not that interesting, W. One of the teams went AWOL while you were reorganizing those Sarkaz mercenaries.

messages.zh: 好像是支负责清扫战场的后勤队伍，所以我们直接发起了追击。
messages.en: I seems to be a clean up team that was supposed to get rid leftovers from the battlefield, so we launched a pursuit.

messages.zh: 意料之内的，他们变成了一盘散沙，一触即溃，开始向城外撤离。
messages.en: Surprisingly, they scattered, collapsing their team, and began to evacuate the city.

messages.zh: 可喜可贺。
messages.en: Congratulations.

messages.zh: 但，意料之外的情况是......我们派去追击的小队，和我们失去了联系。
messages.en: But the unexpected thing is... The team we sent in pursuit lost contact with us.

messages.zh: 作为佣兵们的新领头人，希望你能给出合理的解释。
messages.en: As the new leader of the mercenaries, I hope you can give me a reasonable explanation.

messages.zh: 我们的小队为什么人间蒸发了？
messages.en: Why did our team disappeared?

messages.zh: 切尔诺伯格
messages.en: Chernoborg

messages.zh: 这种描述可不利于我理解喔？
messages.en: Your kind of explanation is not good for my comprehension, you know?

messages.zh: 事实如此。协同小队没发现埋伏和陷阱，只知道敌人是萨卡兹人。
messages.en: That's true. But the team found no ambushes or traps, only that the enemy was a Sarkaz.

messages.zh: 那自然是萨卡兹了，我的佣兵还能有什么其他种族呢？不过，挺有趣的。接着说。
messages.en: Of course it's Sarkaz. What other race are in my mercenary team? But that's interesting. Continue.

messages.zh: 最先接触的时候，目标被成功压制，出于谨慎，追击小队也有所保留。对方并不是什么强敌。
messages.en: At first contact, the target was successfully suppressed, and out of caution, the pursuit team held back since the other side was not a strong enemy.

messages.zh: 然而某个时刻，通讯突然中断了。
messages.en: At some point, however, communication was suddenly cut off.

messages.zh: ......嗯，比起你们，真正的野兽更善于隐藏自己的尖牙利齿，你们这也太大意了吧。
messages.en: ... Well, it seems real beasts are better at hiding their fangs than you, you were too careless.

messages.zh: 我们该怎么办？
messages.en: What should we do now?

messages.zh: 那些萨卡兹人有什么特点？
messages.en: What's the distinguishing feature of that Sarkaz?

messages.zh: ......不清楚，目击者大都失去了联络。从远处看，只知道有一名近身陷阵的战士。
messages.en: ... I don't know much. Witnesses are mostly out of contact. From a distance, only one soldier was known to be in close combat.

messages.zh: 那就不要和他们正面接触。拖住那个人，我们一会见。
messages.en: Don't confront them head on. Delay that person. I'll see you later.

messages.zh: 出了什么事？
messages.en: Did something happened?

messages.zh: 没什么，只是有一支不够成熟的小队中了诱饵。
messages.en: Nothing. It's one of the less mature teams has been baited.

messages.zh: 我们要去支援他们吗？
messages.en: Are we going to support them?

messages.zh: 唉，明明大家都有自己的工作，为什么不能各自处理好分内的事情呢？
messages.en: Alas, clearly everyone has their own work to do, why can't each of them deal with the matter of duty?

messages.zh: 嗯......不过这次就不深究了吧。毕竟我也非常在意我可怜的前领导带着哪些奇怪的萨卡兹人呢。
messages.en: Hmm... I won't go deep into the matter this time around. After all, I'm also very concerned about the strange Sarkaz that my poor former leader had with him.

messages.zh: 明白了。
messages.en: Understood.

messages.zh: 通知全体小队，临战整备，转移到城郊。
messages.en: Call all units, tell them to get ready, it's time to move to the suburbs.

messages.zh: 呃，该死，这家伙的动作又变快了！他还在隐藏实力吗？
messages.en: Uh, damn, this guy's moving fast again! Is he still hiding his true strength?

messages.zh: ......太弱小了，所谓的整合运动只有这种水平吗？
messages.en: ... Too weak. Is this the only standard of Reunion Movement?

messages.zh: 你这家伙！竟然小看我们——
messages.en: You bastard! How dare you actually underestimate us——
I see...

messages.zh: 本来就预想到会遇上几个老熟人，可没想到会是你啊。
messages.en: I was expecting to meet some old acquaintances, but I didn't think it would be you.

messages.zh: W，我们——
messages.en: W, we——

messages.zh: 归队，除非你想送死。别摆出那副急着报仇的表情，他还没有使出全力。哦，想送死的话，我就不拦着你咯？
messages.en: Stand back unless you want to die. Don't show that expression of impatience for revenge. He hasn't done his best yet. Oh, if you want to die, I won't stop you at all.
... Stand back.

messages.zh: 很久不见了，佣兵刀术师。
messages.en: Long time no see, sellsword master.
You——

messages.zh: 现在，叫我W。
messages.en: Now, call me W.

messages.zh: 你呢？
messages.en: How about you?

messages.zh: 炎客。你应该明白，于我而言，互报姓名的意义。
messages.en: Flamebringer. You should understand what it means to me to exchange names.

messages.zh: 哎呀，可怕可怕，过去你手刃那些家伙的时候，也会互报姓名吗？
messages.en: Aiyah, how scary. Did you gave your name to those people you killed in the past?

messages.zh: 委托和厮杀是不一样的。
messages.en: Comission is different from fighting.

messages.zh: 作为一个经历过那场战争的萨卡兹人忽然销声匿迹，很令人担心啊。
messages.en: It was worrying for a Sarkaz who had lived through that war to suddenly disappear.

messages.zh: 佣兵嘛，只不过是换了个领头人就要跑路，让人很心慌喔？
messages.en: Mercenaries, just a change of leadership and then they want to run away, they're making people nervous.

messages.zh: 这无关紧要。
messages.en: It doesn't matter.

messages.zh: 不过没想到，你的部下连让我报上名字的价值都没有。
messages.en: But I didn't think that your men are not even worthy of hearing my name.

messages.zh: 那还真是荣幸......嗯，虽然他们成为我部下也没多长时间。啊，你是在邀请我杀了你？
messages.en: That's an honor... Well, they haven't been under me for very long. Oh, are you inviting me to kill you?

messages.zh: 不，我对你仰仗外力的战斗方式毫无兴趣。
messages.en: No, I'm not interested in the way you fight using tricks outside of true combat.

messages.zh: 但我得承认，战术也是一种技巧。如果你的战术比过去更加精湛，我愿意领教。
messages.en: But I must admit, tactics are a skill as well. If your tactics are better than what they used to be, I'd like to learn from you.

messages.zh: ......奇怪，你过去不是那种“只要杀了目标怎么都好”的类型吗？
messages.en: ... Strange, weren't you used to be the "just kill my target" type?

messages.zh: W，小队已经分散到了指定点，已经彻底切断了敌人的退路，他逃不掉的。
messages.en: W, the squad has been dispersed to the designated point, we've completely cut off the enemy's retreat, he can't escape.

messages.zh: 我也没想到你能成为这些家伙的领导者，大家都在改变。
messages.en: I didn't expect you to be the leader of these guys. It seems everyone is changing.

messages.zh: 这些家伙？啊......你是说整合运动？
messages.en: These guys? Ah... You mean the Reunion Movement?

messages.zh: 还是说......萨卡兹们？
messages.en: Or say... Sarkaz's?
Hurgh——！

messages.zh: 唔。
messages.en: Hmm.

messages.zh: 我是不会轻敌的，萨卡兹人，我注意你很久了。
messages.en: I don't underestimate the enemy, Sarkazian. I've been watching you for a long time.

messages.zh: 很可惜，你没有机会钻空子。
messages.en: A shame, you don't have a chance to take advantage of this.

messages.zh: 原来如此，你也是......
messages.en: I see. So you are too...

messages.zh: 这不是有意思多了吗，你能作为砥石为我所用吗？我的刀有些钝了。
messages.en: Isn't this much more interesting? Can you be a whetstone for me? My sword has become a little blunt.

messages.zh: 挑衅？你也就现在能嚣张两下了！
messages.en: Insults? You sure are arrogant now!

messages.zh: 嗯，来吧。
messages.en: Come get some.

messages.zh: 唔呃！该死！你是怎么——
messages.en: Augh! Damn! How did you——
Ahh——!

messages.zh: 你还有空说话吗？
messages.en: Do you still have some time to talk?

messages.zh: ......意料之内，他变得更强了。
messages.en: ... Not surprisingly, he became stronger.

messages.zh: W！我们为什么就站在这里看着！？只要你下令，他立刻就会灰飞烟灭了！
messages.en: W! Why are we just standing here watching! ? If you give the order now, he'll go up in smoke!

messages.zh: 所以现在，我又能对你发号施令了？
messages.en: So now I can give you orders?

messages.zh: 别在这种时候找茬！
messages.en: Don't pick on us at such a time!

messages.zh: 但我确实不是你们的指挥官呀。
messages.en: But I'm not really your commander.

messages.zh: 提个建议，收手吧，别刺激他了，自找麻烦最好换个时间。
messages.en: A piece of advice. Stop irritating him. It's better to ask for trouble at another time.
... Damn it.

messages.zh: 不是吧？你难道真的打算单打独斗就解决他？别在这里搞笑啊。
messages.en: Are you serious? Are you really going to go at him alone? Don't be funny here.

messages.zh: 嘁。
messages.en: Bah!

messages.zh: 下一个是谁？
messages.en: Who's next?

messages.zh: 这么着急，是赶着去赴谁的约吗？
messages.en: Are you in such a hurry to meet someone?

messages.zh: 我不是第一次杀出重围了。
messages.en: It's not the first time I've broke through.

messages.zh: 唔，嗯，原来如此。我想，你大概是在说内战时候的事吧？我有点兴趣，能说说吗？
messages.en: Well, well, I see. You're talking about the civil war, I suppose? I'm interested. Can you tell me more about it?

messages.zh: 没什么。被人埋伏，所有人死了而我还活着，就这么简单。
messages.en: It's nothing. There was an ambush, everybody's dead and I'm the only alive, it's as simple as that.

messages.zh: 怎么样？还要继续吗？
messages.en: How's about it? Do you want to continue?

messages.zh: 对我来说，刚才的战斗还远远不够。
messages.en: To me, that fight was not enough.

messages.zh: 不......我在想，也许你应该加入我们。
messages.en: No... I was thinking, maybe you should join us.

messages.zh: W！？他这个叛逃者，已经杀了那么多整合运动的——
messages.en: W! ? He, is a defector, he killed so many of the Reunion Movement——

messages.zh: 是我的佣兵们决定要用他，整合运动需要他。有意见？
messages.en: It was my mercenaries who decided to use him. The Reunion Movement needs him. You're having opinions?

messages.zh: 你！
messages.en: You!

messages.zh: 不管怎么想，都是我们这边更有趣吧？战争，流血，还有那么多萨卡兹同僚......
messages.en: Either way, isn't our side more interesting? War, bloodshed, and so many of Sarkaz comrades...

messages.zh: 你追求的一切在这里都是打折大放送哦。
messages.en: Everything you're after is on sale here.

messages.zh: 当然，这份邀请也出于我个人的好奇心，我们一定有很多共同话题。
messages.en: Of course, this invitation is also out of my own personal curiosity, we must have a lot in common.

messages.zh: 我不这么认为。
messages.en: I don't think so.

messages.zh: 你也是感染者吧？加入整合运动又有什么不好呢？
messages.en: You're infected? What's wrong with joining the Reunion Movement?

messages.zh: 无序的破坏，带着某种目的的集团暴行，我看不出能从这样的组织里得到什么。
messages.en: I do not see what can be gained from joining such an organization as disorderly destructive and using mob violence with a certain purpose.

messages.zh: 战争？现在的你们不过是摩擦迸发出的点点火种，你应该知道真正的战争是什么样的。
messages.en: War? You're just a little spark of friction now, you should know what a real war looks like.

messages.zh: 别这么说，我们也是有在努力工作的，何况整合运动之间也有区别嘛。
messages.en: Come on, we're working hard over here, and there's a difference between the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 虽然我的前任上司喜欢更纯粹些的东西，但我可是无论什么都乐在其中啊。
messages.en: Although my former boss liked purer things, I find joy in everything.

messages.zh: 如果非要说的话......是呢，我想领教一下塔露拉的剑术。
messages.en: If I must say... well, I want to test Talulah's swordmanship.

messages.zh: 那个龙女？虽然我不想称赞她，但你基本没有一丁点胜算喔。
messages.en: That dragon woman? I don't want to praise her, but you're not even close to her level.

messages.zh: 而且她那个，能算剑术吗？你在靠近她之前就会变成一块炭吧？
messages.en: And her skill? Can that even be called swordsmanship? You'll be a lump of coal before you get near her, you know?

messages.zh: 我知道。
messages.en: I know.

messages.zh: 当然，我也知道，如果我拒绝你的条件，我突围的机会同样小之又小。
messages.en: Of course, I know that if I reject your offer, my chances of breaking through are just as slim.

messages.zh: 可这又何妨？只有在令人窒息的枷锁中挣脱，我才有可能更进一步。
messages.en: But why does it matter? Only by breaking free of such suffocating shackles could I improve further.

messages.zh: 你......什么时候变得这么有情调了？
messages.en: You...... When did you become so romantic?

messages.zh: 我只是在寻求自己活着的意义。
messages.en: I'm just looking for my own meaning in life.

messages.zh: 好吧，随你怎么说。不要管那个龙女了，单纯加入佣兵队伍如何？
messages.en: Well, whatever you say. Never mind that dragon woman, how about simply joining the mercenary team?

messages.zh: 老工作的话，你也能更加得心应手吧。再说了，你不喜欢的上司，已经死了哦。
messages.en: You'll be better at your old job, too. Besides, the boss you don't like is dead.

messages.zh: 你并不值得信任。你我都互相隐瞒了很多事情。
messages.en: You can't be trusted. You and I hide a lot from each other.

messages.zh: ......呵，有一个很不错的地方，那里比整合运动更适合磨砺我的刀刃。
messages.en: ... Oh, there's a better place to sharpen my edge than Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 我看到了。不久之前，我看到你和那个外来的萨卡兹人交易的场面。但除此之外，他们的战斗令我心动。
messages.en: I saw it. Not long ago, I saw you fighting against that outsider Sarkaz. But other than that, I was thrilled by their fight.

messages.zh: 还有这种事？！
messages.en: You saw?!

messages.zh: 就算他最后被你除掉了，事实就是事实，依然在那里。遮掩是没用的。
messages.en: Even if you got rid of him in the end, the truth is the truth. It's still there. Covering up is pointless.

messages.zh: 唔。
messages.en: Huh.

messages.zh: 真是败给你啦！行啦行啦。我确实和他口头约定好，让他干掉我的上司，方便我去做事呢。
messages.en: I really lost to you! Okay, okay. I did make a verbal pact with him to get rid of my boss so I could do my job.

messages.zh: 毕竟大家也是老相识了嘛，面子也是要卖一个的。
messages.en: After all, we are also old acquaintances, he had to let me.

messages.zh: 但你不可能放过他们。
messages.en: But you can't let them go.

messages.zh: 至少我放过了他想保护的人啊。
messages.en: At least I let go the people he was trying to protect.

messages.zh: 我答应他，会给罗德岛的救援队提供帮助——这和我杀死他这件事，也没什么矛盾吧？
messages.en: I promised him I would help the Rhodes Island rescue team——it doesn't contradict me killing him, I think?

messages.zh: 再说了，我也有自己的规划，钓线总要放长一些才行。但手上的猎物，也没理由让他跑了。
messages.en: Besides, I had my own plan. The bait line had to be longer. But there was no reason to let him run, he was prey.

messages.zh: 就算这样，他也消灭了你好不容易弄到手的精英战士。
messages.en: Even so, he's eliminated the elite warriors you've had a hard time getting.

messages.zh: 够了！这事，我可还是很生气的！
messages.en: Enough is enough! I'm still very angry about it!

messages.zh: 唉。难得遇到一位旧识，本来还以为能搞好关系，最后还是你死我活，我也很伤心的。
messages.en: Alas. It was hard to meet an old acquaintance, and I thought I could get along well with him. I'm sad that it had to end up like this.

messages.zh: ......W，我们必须动手了。拖得太久会影响既定的计划。
messages.en: ... W, we have to start. Any further delays will affect the established plan.

messages.zh: 好啦，既然大家时间都很紧迫......你真的不打算改变你的看法？
messages.en: Okay, since everyone is pressed for time... Are you really not going to change your mind?

messages.zh: 自然不会。
messages.en: Of course not.

messages.zh: 最后一个问题，你现在的雇主是谁？啊，抱歉，反正你是不会说的吧。
messages.en: Last question, who is your present employer? Oh, I'm sorry, you're not going to tell me anyways.

messages.zh: 但我大致猜得到。
messages.en: But I have a rough guess.

messages.zh: 是吗，我以为他们没有那么有名。
messages.en: Really? I thought they weren't that famous.

messages.zh: 我有不少旧识在那里。欸，虽然我的旧识到处都是啦，你也算是呢。
messages.en: I have a lot of old friends there. Well, even though I've got a lot of old acquaintances, you count too.

messages.zh: 前言不搭后语。
messages.en: You're being incoherent.

messages.zh: 不，我要说的是，我也许清楚一些你以前的佣兵队伍被消灭的内幕。
messages.en: No, what I'm saying is, I may know something about the death of your old mercenary unit.

messages.zh: 尊敬的刀术师队长，策划了那次的阴谋，让你变成现在这样子的人，说不定就在你要去的地方哦？
messages.en: Dear captain of the sword division, who plotted that conspiracy to make you the person you are now, maybe that is where you need to go?

messages.zh: 是吗？
messages.en: Is that so?
Is that so...

messages.zh: 有趣。
messages.en: Interesting.

messages.zh: 啊哈哈，原来你不知道！当然了，我也是刚刚才知道。
messages.en: Aha, so you don't know! Of course, I just found out about it.

messages.zh: 很快你就会发现，事情肯定没你想的那么简单。
messages.en: You will soon discover that things are not as simple as you think.

messages.zh: 我很期待你会怎么做，呵呵，你总会做些什么的。
messages.en: I am looking forward to what you will do, hehe, you will always do something.

messages.zh: W！你还要等到什么时候！？
messages.en: W! How long will you wait? ?

messages.zh: 哎，说真的，我的萨卡兹们不会动手哦？要干活，你们自己去干。
messages.en: Oh, seriously, my Sarkazian don't know how to just do it? If you need the work done. Do it yourself.

messages.zh: 刀术师——不，炎客，在之后的战斗里，你可能会死。
messages.en: Swordmaster - no, Flamebringer, you may die in the battle that follows.

messages.zh: 久违的死局。我很兴奋。
messages.en: It's been a long awaited time for a game of death. I'm excited.

messages.zh: 久违的？这么说来，也许你佣兵队的全灭并没让你变得冷酷，反而让你变得快乐起来了？
messages.en: Long awaited? So maybe the demise of your mercenary squad didn't make you colder, but made you joyful instead?

messages.zh: 我和你没有相像之处，W. 快乐不是值得追求的目标。
messages.en: I have nothing in common with you, W. Joy is not a goal worth pursuing.

messages.zh: “上一次”让我失去了很多东西，但我眼前的道路却变得明晰而清澈。
messages.en: "Last time" made me lose a lot of things, but the road before me has become clearer.

messages.zh: 这一次，希望你们不要让我失望。
messages.en: This time, I hope you don't disappoint me.

messages.zh: 你居然在笑哎。
messages.en: You're laughing.

messages.zh: 如果我说这次会饶你一命，你信吗？
messages.en: If I say I'll spare your life this time, do you believe me?

messages.zh: 我，也想这么问。
messages.en: I, want to ask that as well.

messages.zh: 合同内容——似乎没有要求你在正式登舰前，就和整合运动正面冲突。
messages.en: Contract content——it doesn't seem to require you to confront the Reunion Movement before you actually get on board of Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 是我个人的原因。
messages.en: It's for my personal reason.

messages.zh: 我们欢迎感染者和有志于解决感染者问题的各类人才，但绝不接纳违反规则和条例的人。
messages.en: We welcome those who are infected and those who are interested in solving the problem of infected people, but we will never accept those who violate the rules and regulations.

messages.zh: 鉴于我们并不知道当时的具体情况，就不把这件事纳入考察了。
messages.en: Since we don't know what actually happened at the time, we won't take it into account.

messages.zh: 下不为例。
messages.en: Just this once.

messages.zh: 如果有必要，就按你们的方式处理。
messages.en: If necessary, I accept handling of your way.

messages.zh: 我们已经处理过了。你的动机和个人诉求，我们不会纳入考量——不如说。
messages.en: We've taken care of that. Your motives and personal aspirations, we won't take it into account——let's be clear.

messages.zh: 如果判断你是罗德岛无法接纳的人，那么即使你既高尚又正直，我们也不能网开一面。
messages.en: If we judge you to be an unacceptable person to Rhodes Island, even if you are noble and honest, we cannot afford to let you off the hook.

messages.zh: 是的，仅仅是我的个人诉求。
messages.en: Yes, it's just my personal request.

messages.zh: 哼，不管这个，欢迎来到罗德岛。
messages.en: Well, we'll leave it be. Welcome to Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 这么说吧，你的行为每时每刻，都会影响到身边干员，身边的干员也会针对你的行为作出决策。
messages.en: Let's just say that every moment of every day, your actions will affect the people around you, and the people around you will make decisions about your actions.

messages.zh: 只要你遵守规则，罗德岛会十分宽容地对待你，无论你的过去怎么样。
messages.en: As long as you follow the rules, Rhodes Island is tolerant of you, no matter what your past is.

messages.zh: 相反，听着，干员炎客，只要你做出哪怕一丁点出格的事情......
messages.en: Instead, listen, operator Flamebringer, if you do anything even remotely out of line...

messages.zh: 唔。
messages.en: Hmm.

messages.zh: 接下来，我领你去医疗部门吧，有个人想见见你。
messages.en: Next, I'll take you to the medical department. Someone wants to see you.
——You are?
You...
I'm sorry, excuse me.
... Hmm.

messages.zh: 真是这样。
messages.en: So it is true.

messages.zh: W，你还真是诚实啊......
messages.en: W, you are so honest...

messages.zh: 看来活久一点，确实有些益处。
messages.en: It seems that living longer does have some benefits.
